entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Mentioned as a place where weekends are held, described in the text as 'Hogsmeade weekends'.

entities.name: high inquisitor of hogwarts
entities.description: A position mentioned in the text, described as having a highly official-looking seal and signature.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Mentioned in the text as the High Inquisitor who has the power to grant permission for student organizations to re-form.

relationships.description: The High Inquisitor is held by Professor Umbridge, as mentioned in the text.
The High Inquisitor has authority over student organizations, as stated in the text that no organization may exist without their knowledge and approval.
